text: "" ("National Anthem") is the national anthem of San Marino. It was written by Federico Consolo and replaced an older national anthem in 1894. ==Lyrics== Italian original"Accendi Radio San Marino e canta con noi!" by Catia Demonte, San Marino RTV, 19 March 2020 (in Italian) IPA transcription Romagnol translationhttps://lyricstranslate.com/en/national-anthem-san-marino-inno- nazionale-ino.html English translation ğ„† Oh ancient Republic, honour to thee righteous honour to thee. ğ„‡ Generous, trusted, Righteous. Oh, Republic, Honour and live forever with the life and the glory of Italy. Oh ancient Republic, honour to thee. ==References== Category:San Marino Category:European anthems
title: Inno Nazionale della Repubblica
